text: Roland Emmerich (born 10 November 1955) is a German movie director, producer and screenwriter. He was born in Stuttgart and grew up in nearby Sindelfingen, Baden-Wurttemberg, West Germany. His movies include Universal Soldier, Stargate, Independence Day, Godzilla, The Patriot, The Day After Tomorrow, 10,000 BC, 2012, Anonymous, and White House Down. Emmerich is openly gay.Roland Emmerich reveals details on his gay pool parties == References == == Other websites == * Category:Gay men Category:German LGBT people Category:German movie directors Category:German movie producers Category:German screenwriters Category:LGBT directors Category:LGBT producers Category:LGBT screenwriters Category:People from Stuttgart Category:Television producers Category:1955 births Category:Living people
title: Roland Emmerich
